"From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life." Do you agree that it is time every individual wake up and give back to the society for the overall upliftment of mankind. If so, can one contribute to the social sector while being employed in the corporate world?

 My objective is to get an oppurtunity in organisation, use my knowledge and hardwork to develop the organisation and i learn from company then develop my communication skills, i can make a living in this company to work hardly.

you will give to me good oppurtunity and best salary, however i will use my knowledge serve`s to company and it makes to life good oppurtunity to i learn from company it makes to do work easily and fast in my life.

yes it is time every individual has to wake up and give back to the society for every day to day, overall upliftment of mankind has to work in a organisation to develop skills and knowldge to us improve use for every individual.

i contribute to the social sector while being employed in the corporate world to contribute the social service it has to give a understanding people in social sector.
